#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    string s;
    int q;
    cin >> s;
    cin >> q;
    long long int l = s.size();
    while(q--) {
               long long int a,b;
               cin >> a >> b;
               a--;
               b--;
               if(s[a%l] == s[b%l]) cout << "Yes" << endl;
               else cout << "No" << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
